overview_of_class:
Primarily designed for the MFA in Documentary, this class will address finalizing the look and sound of student's documentary projects. We will cover basic color correction and sound design, using Avid and Premiere's built-in color and audio tools as well as basics in Davinci Resolve, Adobe Audition, and Pro-Tools. In addition to becoming familiar with the basics of color and sound, we'll cover what steps to take when working with a colorist and sound designer, and how to prepare "deliverables" for broadcast, web, and festivals.

Primary consideration will be given to MFA in Documentary students. Remaining spots will be given to interested undergrads.
name: Topics in Post-Production
